title: Vlad Dracula
description:
A historical romance about Vlad III, king of the Duchy of Wallachia.
A tyrant of cruelty or a hero who protected his country?
It is the middle of the 15th century. The Ottoman Empire dominates Europe to the south, and Hungary to the west.
In Wallachia (now Southern Romania), a small country sandwiched between these two powerful nations, a young prince is crowned.
His name is Vlad III.While domestic politics is dominated by the nobility and foreign policy is influenced by the situation of the great powers, Vlad III is crowned king of Wallachia, a small country between two powerful countries,Vlad demonstrates his talents in order to protect his homeland, Wallachia.
author: Akiyo Ohkubo
